name: cp20231017-BusinessRules
signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID="Context1"  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2023-10-17 17:05:08"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <BusinessRules>
    <BusinessRule ID="Create10Items" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var children = node.getChildren();
if (children==null || children.size()==0) {
	logger.info("No Children on "+node.getID());
	for (var i=0; i<10; i++) {
		node.createProduct("","Item");
	}
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Create 10 Items</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
    <BusinessRule ID="CreateProducts" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
//var children = node.getChildren();
var iMax = 104;
for (var i=0; i<iMax; i++) {
	node.createProduct("","Item");
	iCurrent = i + 1;
	log.info("Created product " + iCurrent + " of " + iMax);
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">CreateProducts</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="false">
        <ValidObjectType ID="Tree"/>
      </ValidObjectTypes>
    </BusinessRule>
    <BusinessRule ID="Create10Leafs" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var children = node.getChildren();
if (children==null || children.size()==0) {
	for (var i=0; i<10; i++) {
		node.createProduct("","Tree");
	}
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Create 10 Leafs</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
    <BusinessRule ID="DeleteItems" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
if (node!=null) {
	node.delete();
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">DeleteItems</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="false">
        <ValidObjectType ID="Item"/>
      </ValidObjectTypes>
    </BusinessRule>
  </BusinessRules>
</STEP-ProductInformation>
